Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class WarehouseDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.WarehouseDepot
Direct Known Subclasses:
WarehouseDepotStub, WarehouseDepotStub1
public class WarehouseDepot
extends java.lang.Object
Identify Player's WareHouseDepot, composed of 3 shelves and other possible extra slots, gained from the activation of some leader cards Each player has the reference to a unique and personal WareHouseDepot Here can be store resources coming from the market The resources store here can be used to buy development cards, activate productions and activate leader cards

      Returns:
      the extra slot selected by id
      Throws:
      InvalidIDExcpetion - if ID is not found in the extra slot list

      Parameters:
      shelf - : integer between 1 and 3
      Returns:
      what kind of resource is contained in the shelf
      Throws:
      InvalidShelfPosition - if shelf isn't an integer between 1 and 3

    • move

      public void move​(int fromShelf, int toShelf) throws InvalidShelfPosition, NotEnoughSpaceException
      Move resources from a shelf to another shelf
      Parameters:
      fromShelf - first shelf's number
      toShelf - second shelf's number
      Throws:
      InvalidShelfPosition - if shelf isn't an integer between 1 and 3
      NotEnoughSpaceException - if you try to put in a shelf more resources than its capacity

    • addResource

      public int addResource​(int shelf, int quantity, Resource resource) throws InvalidShelfPosition, ExistingResourceException, InvalidResourceException
      Add resources in a shelf
      Parameters:
      shelf - integer between 1 and 3
      quantity - must be less or equal than shelf
      resource - specific resource to be added to the specific shelf
      Throws:
      InvalidShelfPosition - if shelf isn't an integer between 1 and 3
      ExistingResourceException - if the selected resource already exists in another shelf
      InvalidResourceException - if the selected resource is different from the resources already stored at the same shelf

    • removeResource

      public int removeResource​(Resource resource, int quantity)
      Remove resources from a shelf
      Parameters:
      resource - : resource type
      quantity - number of resources to be removed, of the specified type
      Returns:
      the number of resources that you need to remove from the Strongbox

    • getExtraSlotList

      public java.util.ArrayList<ExtraSlot> getExtraSlotList()
      Returns:
      the list of extra slots activated

    • removeExtraResource

      public int removeExtraResource​(Resource resource, int quantity) throws MissingExtraSlot
      Remove a resource from the extra slot
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resources that have to be removed from a extra slot
      quantity - number of resources that have to be removed from a extra slot
      Throws:
      MissingExtraSlot - if there isn't an extra slot for the requested resource

    • addExtraResource

      public int addExtraResource​(Resource resource, int quantity) throws MissingExtraSlot
      Add a resource to the extra slot
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resources that have to be added inside an extra slot
      quantity - number of resources that have to be added from a extra slot
      Throws:
      MissingExtraSlot - if there isn't an extra slot for the requested resource

    • getExtraQuantity

      public int getExtraQuantity​(Resource resource)
      Get the quantity of resource stored in the extra slot
      Parameters:
      resource - extra slot type of resource required
      Returns:
      0 if there isn't an extra slot for the requested resource

      public void addExtraSlot​(Resource resourceExtra, int ID)
      create a new ExtraSlot object and initialize it with the resource type
      Parameters:

    • getResourceQuantity

      public int getResourceQuantity​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resources required
      Returns:
      quantity of the selected resource in stock, 0 if there are no resource in stock

    • moveFromShelfToSlot

      public void moveFromShelfToSlot​(int shelf, int quantity) throws InvalidShelfPosition, NotEnoughSpaceException, MissingExtraSlot
      It moves a specified quantity of resources from a specified a shelf to an extra slot.
      Parameters:
      shelf - the specified shelf from which resources are supposed to be moved: the first shelf starts with 1
      quantity - quantity of resources to be moved : if quantity is higher than the actual quantity on the shelf, it will be considered to move all the resources that are on the shelf.
      Throws:
      InvalidShelfPosition - if shelf is less than 1 or shelf is greater 3
      NotEnoughSpaceException - if there is not enough space to store all the required resources into the extra slot
      MissingExtraSlot - if does not exist an extra slot that can store the specified resource

    • moveFromSlotToShelf

      public void moveFromSlotToShelf​(Resource resource, int quantity, int shelf) throws InvalidShelfPosition, ExistingResourceException, InvalidResourceException, NotEnoughSpaceException
      It moves a specified quantity of resources from an extra slot to a specified shelf.
      Parameters:
      resource - the specified type of resources that have to be moved from an extra slot
      quantity - quantity of resources to be moved : if quantity is higher than the actual quantity in the extra slot, it will be considered to move all the resources that are in the extra slot.
      shelf - the specified shelf where the resources are supposed to be moved: the first shelf starts with 1
      Throws:
      InvalidShelfPosition - if shelf is less than 1 or shelf is greater than 3
      ExistingResourceException - if there are already a few resources inside of the specified shelf which type is different from the required one
      InvalidResourceException - if there is no extra slot that stores the type of resources required
      NotEnoughSpaceException - if there is not enough space to store all the required resources into the shelf

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe​(VirtualView virtualView)

    • getAmountOfResources

      public int getAmountOfResources()
      returns the amount in the shelves and the slots.
      Returns:
      the amount in the shelves and the slots.

    • insertMissing

      private void insertMissing()
      It figures out a resource that does not appear on any shelf, then assign it to shelves having quantity = 0
